Name: English

AUOptions.Name: AUOptions
AUOptions.Desc: Set Notify before download Windows Updates

AutoEndTasks.Name: Auto End Tasks
AutoEndTasks.Desc: Close frozen processes to avoid system crash

BtnSys_SaveOptimizeConfigAll.Desc: Save all optimization configurations to file

BtnSys_SaveOptimizeConfigTab.Desc: Save this tab only optimization configuration to file

DisableAADCloudSearch.Name: Turn off Cloud Content Search AAD
DisableAADCloudSearch.Desc: Turn off Cloud Content Search for Work or School Account

DisableAeDebug.Name: Disable AeDebug
DisableAeDebug.Desc: Disable the debugger to speed up error processing

DisableAnimationEffectMaxMin.Name: Disable Animation Effect Max Min
DisableAnimationEffectMaxMin.Desc: Close animation effect when maximizing or minimizing a window to speed up the window response

DisableAppendCompletion.Name: Disable Append Completion
DisableAppendCompletion.Desc: Disable inline Auto-Complete (Append completion or Auto-fill)

DisableAutoDefragIdle.Name: Disable Auto Defrag Idle
DisableAutoDefragIdle.Desc: Disable auto defrag when idle to increase working life of SSD

DisableAutoplay.Name: Disable Autoplay
DisableAutoplay.Desc: Disable the “Autoplay” feature on drives to avoid virus infection

DisableBootOptimize.Name: Disable Boot Optimize
DisableBootOptimize.Desc: Disable defrag system drive on boot to increase working life of SSD

DisableCrashAutoReboot.Name: Disable Crash Auto Reboot
DisableCrashAutoReboot.Desc: Disable automatical reboot when system encounters blue screen of death

DisableDeviceSearchHistory.Name: Turn off Search history locally
DisableDeviceSearchHistory.Desc: Turn off Search history locally on this devices

DisableDiagTrack.Name: Disable DiagTrack
DisableDiagTrack.Desc:
DiagTrack - The Connected User Experiences and Telemetry service enables features that support in-application and connected user experiences.
Additionally, this service manages the event driven collection and transmission of diagnostic and usage information (used to improve the experience and quality of the Windows Platform) when the diagnostics and usage privacy option settings are enabled under Feedback and Diagnostics.

DisabledVBSCodeIntegrity.Name: Disabled VBS Code Integrity
DisabledVBSCodeIntegrity.Desc: Disable virtualization-based protection of code integrity

DisableErrorReporting.Name: Disable Error Reporting
DisableErrorReporting.Desc: Disable screen error reporting to improve system performance

DisableGameBar.Name: Disable Game Bar & Game DVR
DisableGameBar.Desc:
The Game DVR feature allows you to record your gameplay in the background.
It is located on the Game Bar – which offers buttons to record gameplay & take screenshots using the Game DVR feature.
But it can slow your gaming performance by recording video in the background.

DisableLowDiskSpaceChecks.Name: Disable Low Disk Space Checks
DisableLowDiskSpaceChecks.Desc: Optimize disk I/O subsystem to improve system performance

Disablememorypagination.Name: Disable memory pagination
Disablememorypagination.Desc:
Disable memory pagination and reduce disk I/O to improve application performance.
(Option may be ignored if physical memory is <1 GB)

DisableMenuShowDelay.Name: Disable Menu Show Delay
DisableMenuShowDelay.Desc: Optimized response speed of system display

DisableMSACloudSearch.Name: Turn off Cloud Content Search MSA
DisableMSACloudSearch.Desc: Turn off Cloud Content Search for Microsoft Account

DisableMSDefender.Name: Disable Microsoft Defender
DisableMSDefender.Desc:
Enable/Disable Microsoft Defender with 1-click.
It will automatically restart the computer.

DisablePrefetchParameters.Name: Disable Prefetch Parameters
DisablePrefetchParameters.Desc: Disable prefetch parameters to increase SSD working life

DisableRemoteRegAccess.Name: Disable Remote Reg Access
DisableRemoteRegAccess.Desc: Disable registry modification from a remote computer

DisableWCE.Name: Disable WCE Improvement
DisableWCE.Desc:
Disable Windows Customer Experience Improvement

- Proxy: This task collects and uploads autochk SQM data if opted-in to the Microsoft Customer Experience Improvement Program.
- Microsoft Compatibility Appraiser: Collects program telemetry information if opted-in to the Microsoft Customer Experience Improvement Program.

DisableWebSearch.Name: Disable Web Search
DisableWebSearch.Desc: Disable search online and include web results from Bing for only your account when you do a search on the taskbar

DisableWebSearchStartMenu.Name: Disable WebSearch Start Menu
DisableWebSearchStartMenu.Desc: Disables Web Search in Start Menu

HideMostUsedApps.Name: Hide most used apps
HideMostUsedApps.Desc: Turn off "Show most used apps" on Start menu

HideStartMenuAccountNotifications.Name: Hide account-related notifications
HideStartMenuAccountNotifications.Desc: Turn off "Show account-related notifications" on Start menu

HideStartMenuRecentlyAdded.Name: Hide recently added apps
HideStartMenuRecentlyAdded.Desc: Turn off "Show recently added apps" on Start menu

HideStartMenuRecentlyOpened.Name: Hide recently opened items
HideStartMenuRecentlyOpened.Desc: Turn off "Show recently opened items in Start, Jump Lists, and File Explorer" on Start menu

HideStartMenuRecommendations.Name: Hide recommendations
HideStartMenuRecommendations.Desc: Turn off "Show recommendations for tips, shortcuts, new apps, and more" on Start menu

HideWindowsSecurityNoncriticalNotificati.Name: Hide WS Non-critical Notifications
HideWindowsSecurityNoncriticalNotificati.Desc:
Only show critical notifications from Windows Security.
If the Suppress all notifications GP setting has been enabled, this setting will have no effect.

HideWindowsSecurityNotifications.Name: Hide WS Notifications
HideWindowsSecurityNotifications.Desc: Hide all notifications from Windows Security.

HostsEdit_TxtSelectLink.Name: Select link for import block list to hosts:

IncreaseIconCache.Name: Increase Icon Cache
IncreaseIconCache.Desc: Increase system icon cache and speed up desktop display

IoPageLockLimit.Name: Io Page Lock Limit
IoPageLockLimit.Desc: Optimize the defauit settings of memory to improve system performance

LinkResolveIgnoreLinkInfo.Name: Link Resolve Ignore LinkInfo
LinkResolveIgnoreLinkInfo.Desc: Do not track Shell shortcuts during roaming

MouseHoverTime.Name: Mouse Hover Time
MouseHoverTime.Desc: Speed up display speed of Taskbar Window Previews

NoInternetOpenWith.Name: No Internet OpenWith
NoInternetOpenWith.Desc: Turn off Internet File Association service

NoResolveSearch.Name: No Resolve Search
NoResolveSearch.Desc: Do not use the search-based method when resolving shell shortcuts

OptimizeNetworkTransfer.Name: Optimize Network Transfer
OptimizeNetworkTransfer.Desc: Optimize network settings to improve transfer performance

Optimizeprocessorperformance.Name: Optimize processor performance
Optimizeprocessorperformance.Desc: Optimize processor performance to make applications, games, etc. run more smoothly.

OptimizeRefreshPolicy.Name: Optimize Refresh Policy
OptimizeRefreshPolicy.Desc: Optimize disk I/O subsystem to improve system performance

PackageManager_DeprovisionPackage.Name: Text_DeprovisionPackage
PackageManager_DeprovisionPackage.Desc: Deprovisions an app Package so new users on the device will no longer have the app automatically installed.

PackageManager_InstalledAllUsers.Name: Text_InstalledAllUsers
PackageManager_InstalledAllUsers.Desc: Show list of installed packages by all users.

PackageManager_Mode.Desc:
Installed Mode: Show list of installed packages.
Not Installed Mode: Show list that is on your computer but not installed by the current user.

ShutdownAcceleration.Name: Shutdown Acceleration
ShutdownAcceleration.Desc: Reduce application idleness at shutdown to improve the shutdown process

Text_ClearStartMenu_Confirm:
Are you sure you want to clear the Start menu layout?
(A backup file "WinTune_StartMenuLayout_xxxx.json" will be created)

Enabling Microsoft Defender requires restarting the computer.

Text_DisableMSDefender1:
Disabling Microsoft Defender requires restarting the computer.
